author: kubuxu
content:
<@!301186049323958275> Yes but only due to how our block production works. We have very high variability of per epoch capacity: `Poisson(5)`. Which means that on average our capacity is `5*maxOfSingleBlock` but we might have epochs with a capacity of only `maxOfSingleBlock`. We are running an analysis on how that affects base fee but no results yet on that front.
So in the steady state where on averegae there is `5/2*maxOfSingleBlock` gas worth messages per epoch, if a single block epoch comes along we will see 200% usage.
